Quickstrike:





All he knew that his job to do was keep watch. Megatron never told him what 
to do, so that left him to monitor the other's work. While Waspinator passed 
a few times by him, going back and forth; that made him a little dizzy. He 
stood outside of the cave, a few strides away from the mouth of it, watching 
the horizon and other little things that needed to be observed.

He slowly turned his head, hearing that Scorponok was going to make a last 
trip to Predacon base. "Hey, while yer there, go t' th' CR room an' bring 
back mah fur pelt ah left in there." he said to him, not looking him in the 
eye.

Then something came to his thoughts. "Hey boss, what about that rat? Hell 
Beast already kill him?" He crossed his arms.
